hizbs.text: qala fama khatbukum ayyuha l-mur'saluna
qalu inna ur'sil'na ila qawmin muj'rimina
linur'sila ʿalayhim hijaratan min tinin
musawwamatan ʿinda rabbika lil'mus'rifina
fa-akhrajna man kana fiha mina l-mu'minina
fama wajadna fiha ghayra baytin mina l-mus'limina
watarakna fiha ayatan lilladhina yakhafuna l-ʿadhaba l-alima
wafi musa idh arsalnahu ila fir'ʿawna bisul'tanin mubinin
fatawalla biruk'nihi waqala sahirun aw majnunun
fa-akhadhnahu wajunudahu fanabadhnahum fi l-yami wahuwa mulimun
wafi ʿadin idh arsalna ʿalayhimu l-riha l-ʿaqima
ma tadharu min shayin atat ʿalayhi illa jaʿalathu kal-ramimi
wafi thamuda idh qila lahum tamattaʿu hatta hinin
faʿataw ʿan amri rabbihim fa-akhadhathumu l-saʿiqatu wahum yanzuruna
fama is'tataʿu min qiyamin wama kanu muntasirina
waqawma nuhin min qablu innahum kanu qawman fasiqina
wal-samaa banaynaha bi-aydin wa-inna lamusiʿuna
wal-arda farashnaha faniʿ'ma l-mahiduna
wamin kulli shayin khalaqna zawjayni laʿallakum tadhakkaruna
fafirru ila l-lahi inni lakum min'hu nadhirun mubinun
wala tajʿalu maʿa l-lahi ilahan akhara inni lakum min'hu nadhirun mubinun
kadhalika ma ata alladhina min qablihim min rasulin illa qalu sahirun aw majnunun
atawasaw bihi bal hum qawmun taghuna
fatawalla ʿanhum fama anta bimalumin
wadhakkir fa-inna l-dhik'ra tanfaʿu l-mu'minina
wama khalaqtu l-jina wal-insa illa liyaʿbuduni
ma uridu min'hum min riz'qin wama uridu an yut'ʿimuni
inna l-laha huwa l-razaqu dhu l-quwati l-matinu
fa-inna lilladhina zalamu dhanuban mith'la dhanubi ashabihim fala yastaʿjiluni
fawaylun lilladhina kafaru min yawmihimu alladhi yuʿaduna
wal-turi
wakitabin masturin
fi raqqin manshurin
wal-bayti l-maʿmuri
wal-saqfi l-marfuʿi
wal-bahri l-masjuri
inna ʿadhaba rabbika lawaqiʿun
ma lahu min dafiʿin
yawma tamuru l-samau mawran
watasiru l-jibalu sayran
fawaylun yawma-idhin lil'mukadhibina
alladhina hum fi khawdin yalʿabuna
yawma yudaʿʿuna ila nari jahannama daʿʿan
hadhihi l-naru allati kuntum biha tukadhibuna
afasih'run hadha am antum la tub'siruna
is'lawha fa-is'biru aw la tasbiru sawaon ʿalaykum innama tuj'zawna ma kuntum taʿmaluna
inna l-mutaqina fi jannatin wanaʿimin
fakihina bima atahum rabbuhum wawaqahum rabbuhum ʿadhaba l-jahimi
kulu wa-ish'rabu hanian bima kuntum taʿmaluna
muttakiina ʿala sururin masfufatin wazawwajnahum bihurin ʿinin
wa-alladhina amanu wa-ittabaʿathum dhurriyyatuhum biimanin alhaqna bihim dhurriyyatahum wama alatnahum min ʿamalihim min shayin kullu im'ri-in bima kasaba rahinun
wa-amdadnahum bifakihatin walahmin mimma yashtahuna
yatanazaʿuna fiha kasan la laghwun fiha wala tathimun
